p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: end;

div.p:
Sent via Walter Struve. MS is accompanied by an envelope addressed by M: ''Meares Esqr President of the Christchurch Liedertafel, Adr. Australian Club.' South-Yarra,
Melbourne.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: end;

div.p: It will afford me much pleasure, dear Mr Meares, to introduce you this evening to a festival (chiefly musical) at the German Club in honor of Herr Professor Kruse, if you will honor us with your presense. If therefore you are not otherwise engaged, you will likely spend with my German friends a pleasant evening and will meet the already celebrated Violin "Virtuose" personally. I will call for you at the Australian Club 7.30 this evening.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
